decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed extensions, by reason of their scale, mass and bulk would not be not be in keeping with the form and character of the host property, to the detriment of its character and that of the wider area. The proposal therefore fails to comply with Policy CC1 and CC2 of the adopted Local Plan together with the aims and objectives of the adopted Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 2 - The proposed ground and first floor rear extensions, by reason of their size, scale and relationship with the neighbouring properties would represent a visually intrusive and excessive form of development resulting in an unacceptable loss of outlook and amenity for the occupiers of neighbouring properties contrary to Policy SC7 of the Local Plan together with aims of the Council's Residential Extension Guidelines.
description: Erection of part single storey/part two storey side and rear extension incorporating hip-to-gable enlargement of the roof.
